betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now we need to break down the Niobium Pentoxide into Niobium and for that we need to bath the Niobium Pentoxide into Molten Aluminum.  

So how do we get Molten Aluminum without a Smelter?  You can use you crucible and then use a ceramic measuring pot (See Quest under Utility Tab for details}.

Machines needed for this quest:
1 Bath
§a§6
Bath Recipe:
7 Niobium Pentoxide Dusts + 480L Molten Aluminum => [Bath] => 2 Niobium Dusts + 4200L Molten Alumina
§6§a
To complete this quest gather:
2 Niobium Dusts
§b
Tip:
You can pour your Molten Alumina into ingots and send it back through your Aluminum processing to get Aluminum back.  You can do this by putting an ingot mold below the Bath and either use pinchers or a hopper and chest to collect the alumina ingots.
